code: import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faLinkedin,faGithub}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';import{faFileDownload,faAngleDoubleDown}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./Intro.css';import headshot from'../../assets/headshot.jpeg';import resume from'../../assets/Neel-Ismail-Resume.pdf';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Intro=function Intro(){var showPortfolio=function showPortfolio(event){event.preventDefault();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"intro-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"intro-background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"headshot",src:headshot,className:"headshot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"name",children:"Hi, I'm Neel."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"intro-text",children:["Computer Science @ ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"University of Waterloo"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"intro-text",children:["Incoming SWE @ ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"RBC Capital Markets"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"icons-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/neelismail/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLinkedin,className:"icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:resume,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faFileDownload,className:"icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://github.com/neelismail01",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub,className:"icon"})})]})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bottom-row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow",onClick:showPortfolio,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faAngleDoubleDown,className:"down-arrow"})})})]});};export default Intro;
